Description

Pyrebug Studios is a Connecticut-based indie game development studio founded in 2019. In this competitive and often toxic industry, our commitment is to not only offer exciting new gaming experiences, but to build and maintain a healthy, positive, open, and constructive working environment.

History

In the summer of 2019, a group of Connecticut college students turned their passion for gaming into a business, and Pyrebug Studios was born. Pyrebug's main focus revolves around building experimental games with fun, original, and dynamic mechanics. Since its inception, Pyrebug has grown to a staff of almost 40, and shows no sign of slowing down. The group's love of gaming and game development drives every project they work on. Now, in 2020, just after their one year anniversary, Pyrebug prepares to launch more than four titles within the year.
